description: Java entity class 'User' representing user accounts with email, password hash, roles, and metadata in a Spring/Hibernate-based application.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Entity class modeling user information for authentication and authorization, including email, password hash, roles, and status fields.

methods.name: User
methods.description: Default constructor for the User class.

methods.name: User(String email, String passwordHash)
methods.description: Parameterized constructor initializing email and password hash.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the user.

methods.name: getEmail
methods.description: Returns the email address of the user.

methods.name: setEmail
methods.description: Sets the email address of the user.

methods.name: getPasswordHash
methods.description: Returns the password hash.

methods.name: setPasswordHash
methods.description: Sets the password hash.

methods.name: getFullName
methods.description: Returns the full name.

methods.name: setFullName
methods.description: Sets the full name.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Returns the current status of the user.

methods.name: setStatus
methods.description: Sets the status of the user.

methods.name: getLastLoginAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp of last login.

methods.name: setLastLoginAt
methods.description: Sets the timestamp of last login.

methods.name: isDeleted
methods.description: Returns whether the user is marked as deleted.

methods.name: setDeleted
methods.description: Marks the user as deleted or active.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the last update timestamp.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the last update timestamp.

methods.name: getRoles
methods.description: Returns the set of roles assigned to the user.

methods.name: setRoles
methods.description: Assigns roles to the user.
